UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effects of positively charged arginine residues on membrane pore forming activity of Rev-NIS peptide in bacterial cells.
Literature.Author: Lee J, Choi H, Cho J, Lee DG
